message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, however,  $14,000 is my bottom line. I know this product will be a great asset to you.
